scripts.project-install: (dropdb --if-exists github-app && createdb github-app) && (npx knex migrate:latest) && nodemon server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.cypress-test: (dropdb --if-exists github-app-test && createdb github-app-test) && (npx knex migrate:latest --env=test) && concurrently "NODE_ENV=test nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start" "cross-env NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/cypress open"
